description:
Contents:
 - Patchwork Wear: Chocolate "A casual outfit made out of patchwork for a rustic farmer's vibe."
 - Kid's Patch-Wear: Chocolate "A casual outfit for kids made out of patchwork for a rustic farmer's vibe."
 *You can buy it at any time in the game shop (Clothing Store in Castle St.) when you purchase it.
 - Pom Casquette: Chocolate "A patchwork cap designed after a Pom Fruit."
*You can buy it at any time in the game shop (Fashion Store in Castle St.) when you purchase it.
name: Patchwork Wear (Chocolate)
